title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade II (Tekkaman Blade II)
synopsis: 10 years have passed since the end of the last war against the radam. A new team of Space Knights has been assembled under the lead of Aki and D-boy. The first mission of the new tekkaman is to defeat the radam but then, they have to fight against a remnent from the past.
